item.title: [PI] command to check other ppls banks?
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

[quote=“Nick-World, post:3, topic:386879”][quote author=Ashton51 link=topic=482649.msg3534686#msg3534686 date=1300484149]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) { String otherPlayer = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(otherPlayer)) { c.getPA().otherBank(c, o); break; } } } }
[/quote]
what file does that go in?[/quote]
…Commands.java

Read full topic
